record.field: Invalid payment date %(payment_date)s for payment "%(payment)s". Payment\'s date must be greather or equal than today.
Payment "%(payment)s" can not be modified because its mandate "%(mandate)s" is canceled.
No valid mandate for payment "%(payment)s" of party "%(party)s" with amount "%(amount)s".
Mandate "%(mandate)s" can not be canceled because it is linked to payment "%(payment)s" which is still in process.
